description: Source code for the FilterScreen widget in a Flutter app. It provides a UI for filtering criteria such as height, weight, hair color, ethnicity, and religion, with reset and apply functionality, and includes internal state management for scrolling and animations.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a filter interface with sections for height, weight, hair color, ethnicity, and religion, with reset and apply buttons.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A stateful widget managing the scrollable body of the filter sections with optional initial focus.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: State class handling the scroll-to-section logic, state of range sliders, and UI updates for filter sections.

classes.name: _AnimatedSectionCard
classes.description: A widget that adds a pulsing visual effect to highlight a section temporarily.

classes.name: _AnimatedSectionCardState
classes.description: State class controlling the pulse animation for section highlight.

classes.name: _SectionCard
classes.description: A card widget encapsulating a filter section's header, content, and helper text.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A widget displaying the header for a filter section, including icon and optional range chip.

classes.name: _HeaderChip
classes.description: A small decoration widget for displaying the current range or selection.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filter criteria to defaults and shows a confirmation snackbar.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets local slider values and triggers the global reset.

methods.name: _buildEnumCheckboxGroup
methods.description: Creates a group of checkboxes for enum-based filter options.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names into human-readable labels.
